extendedInfo.description: Sometimes pictures are so much more than colors and shapes. Sometimes prose is so much more than letters. I Can Read is dedicated to Prose in Pictures. Inspiring quotes and astounding delivery. So you think you can read, too? Pick up I Can Read Flipmag, the fifth title in the series of Flipmag Apps for Android by Fairyteller.If you love the website http://icanread.tumblr.com then this is the absolute best way to browse it on your phone or on your tablet. It's more than a bookmark, it's a new browsing experience.What's a "Flipmag"? A Flipmag by Fairyteller is a new kind of reader tailor-made for your awesome Android device that focuses on giving the best user experience for browsing a Photo Blog. It's gives you the pictures that you want, in the way that you want! Features include:  - See all the latest pictures whenever you want!  - Fully native and innovative user experience!  - Browse all the archives with just a flip of the thumb!  - Automatic Bandwidth Saving Mode when not on wifi!  - Offline Mode when not connected at all!  - Open the pictures with the app of your choice with a long press!  - OpenGL Imaginator Mode for super fast zooming to see all the hidden details of a picture!  - Incognito optional mode, for those who don't want pictures to appear in the device gallery!  - Notifications when there are new posts to see!  - and many more coming so keep updated!If you are experiencing issues or if you have any question, don't hesitate to contact us at support@fairyteller.comFlipmags by Fairyteller are fully native apps, fully hardware accelerated, powered by Tumblr APIs in their latest version, with all the goodness from the latest Android technologies, and still compatible with the large majority of android devices. Each Flipmag is dedicated to a outstanding tumblr blog handpicked from thousands. Fairyteller is not affiliated with the original blog's author. The content is and always will be the artists' property and their pride. Flipmags are merely browsers to let you appreciate their awesome work to the fullest.This app has been tested on the following devices: - Motorola Atrix running Froyo (2.2) - HTC Desire running Froyo (2.2) - Amazon Kindle Fire running Gingerbread (2.2) - Acer Iconia 500 running Honeycomb (3.0) - Motorola Xoom running Honeycomb (3.2) - Motorola Xoom running Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0) - Galaxy Nexus running Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0) - Samsung Galaxy SIII running Ice Cream Sandwich (4.0) - HTC One running Ice Cream Sandwich (4.1) - Nexus 4 running Jelly Bean (4.1) - Nexus 7 running Jelly Bean (4.2 and 4.3)

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: What\'s better than your thoughts, so many are scared of the unknown!
reviews.author: Kenneth Jones

reviews.title: Brilliant!!
reviews.comment: Very inspiring app..  Keep me waiting for a new quote every day..
reviews.author: babe deronsard

reviews.title: Great little app
reviews.comment: Works great on my samsung Note 2.... A great app to see the resilience of people and the various perspectives coupled with great art
reviews.author: Rick M

reviews.title: Amazing (except for dowload)
reviews.comment: Amazing! I\'m hooked. Content is do beautiful I can\'t wait to see what they post next. Wish it wasn\'t so complicated to store the pics to my phone - if they fix that, it\'s 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Great app. The quotes are great with beautiful picture... but this app needs fast processing
reviews.author: Gramin Siahaan

reviews.title: Go Flipmag!!\342\234\224\343\203\204
reviews.comment: I really like this app because it really makes you think about how your life is. The pictures on here are very creative to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A let down
reviews.comment: The picture quality is awful, takes forever to load even with perfect signal, very limited selection. Looked so good. Such a let down...
reviews.author: Sunny Thornton

reviews.title: Loading takes time
reviews.comment: Images loading takes lot of time, also at times in sm images the text is too small to b readable... Also can\'t save on my phone
reviews.author: Swati Agarwal

reviews.title: Nailed it!!! Evo View 4g
reviews.comment: Maneuvering needs work but love the app otherwise i use it to inspire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps force closing
reviews.comment: Sucks. Just downloaded it and it won\'t load. Keeps force choosing. Sucks because it looks like a cute app. Fix this! Samsung galaxy S stratosphere
reviews.author: jen perez

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Great pics-i have no complaint about the quality.but i\'d love to ask about the slow loading,is it caused by the internet connection,the phone system or this own app?
reviews.author: Uyen Dang

reviews.title: Great App ^_^
reviews.comment: Its a great app. Its really awesome in every possible way. But when I don\'t use it for a couple of minutes or hours and you\'ve been through some pics already,it puts u back at the very beginning again and then u have to go through the ones u saw already again. ... but its still an awesome app, just needs something to keep u on that same pic u where on before so u won\'t have to get tired of going through the whole pix again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app...need a better navigation\nand \"Exit\" button.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: All I see is the beginning screen then when I try to move around all it is, is black idk how to use this app! Help!!
reviews.author: Kassie Hurst

reviews.title: Great app, but...
reviews.comment: Like others said, it is really annoying that every picture you look at, automaticly gets saved in your gallery...? And it doesnt stay at the picture where you left, but let you start all over again... :( But great, inspiring quotes and pictures :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderfull
reviews.comment: I love it. Motivating n  touching aplication. Just see all picture with beautiful word to make your day more beautiful and meaningful.
reviews.author: dian mustika sari

reviews.title: Super nice...
reviews.comment: ...because I Can Read Flipmag is full of life quotes and I love quotes of life. But what I don\'t like is the automatic saving of the picture on my phone! Please put a button saying you want to save the picture, \'coz I don\'t like ALL the pictures. My phone\'s out of memory now, so it has to say goodbye to my phone.
reviews.author: Ysabelle Utrera

reviews.title: Great and inspiring app
reviews.comment: Always good for inspiration and motivational images, and some artwork aswell which is very nice and pleasing :)
reviews.author: Mathew Day

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Amazing but i dont like how its always about life make it about love careing friendship family ect
